dnsenum.pl VERSION:1.2.6

-----   example.com   -----

Host's addresses:
__________________

example.com.                             5       IN      A        192.0.2.1

Name Servers:
______________

ns1.example.com.                         5       IN      A        192.0.2.10
ns2.example.com.                         5       IN      A        192.0.2.11

Mail (MX) Servers:
___________________

mail.example.com.                        10      IN      A        192.0.2.20
